name: Sea Fish Match
description:
Sea Fish Match will surely entertain & challenge you to give fun and addiction with happiness. In this classic and free match three game, all you need is to match the three or more fishes and burst them.
Features:
- 500 brain teasing levels uniquely designed, full of challenges and fun.
- Flamboyant and colorful fishes.
- Tremendous and delightful Sea trip.
- An Ideal match 3 puzzle game with addictive levels & cute character.
- Easy to play interface, Just swap and match the fishes.
